physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a row of shophouses on a street. A couple of rickshaws in operation can be seen, as well as some food stands in front of the shophouses. There are many different signs with Chinese characters on the shophouses. Clothes such as tee shirts, shorts, and trousers protrude from the second and third levels of the shophouses.
title_text: Another View of Chinatown Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: mercantile buildings residential structures Chinatowns street scenes
